title: What is GoLuxo?
description: GoLuxo is a platform that showcases my journey as a developer and the projects I've worked on. I'm Samel, a 15-year-old developer from Newmarket, Ontario. I create luxury projects that match your desires. I hope you enjoy my work and find inspiration here. And make sure to get in touch with us if need anything, starting with websites, apps, and even games !

title: First background for GoLuxo
description: Honestly, looks like a 5 year old made it, but it was my first attempt at a background.
